body:
Syntax: cast 'cure light' <target>

Cure light wounds restores 1d8+1 hit points to the target. This is the most
basic healing spell and is essential for treating minor injuries during
adventures.

Classes: Cleric, Druid, Ranger
Level: 1 (Cleric), 3 (Druid), 9 (Ranger)
Mana Cost: 5
Position: Standing, Sitting, or Fighting

This spell can be cast on yourself or others. While not as powerful as higher
level healing spells, it's very useful for its low mana cost and availability
at low levels.

See Also: CURE CRITIC, HEAL
